name: Heise.de full screen width
description:
Changes the new fixed width design of the german IT-news site heise.de to a cleaner one with full screen width.

Also removes ads (even ads for heise themselves e.g. c't or iX ads ) and the sitemap footer.  

v1.0     (08/12)     First Version
v1.1     (08/12)     Updated to better fit the news-boards
v1.1.1  (08/12)     Some minor bugfixes and more ads removed
v1.1.2  (08/12)     Code Cleanup
v1.1.3  (08/12)      Fix for correct displaying heise.de/netze
